licence_overview:
You must apply for approval from the [Department of Agriculture and Rural Development (DARD)](http://www.dardni.gov.uk "Department of Agriculture and Rural Development (DARD)"){:re=:"external"} if you want to:

- market a new unapproved pesticide - commercial level approval
- carry out research and development work on a pesticide - experimental approval
- import a pesticide into the UK identical to an approved pesticide - parallel import approval
- extend the use of an approved pesticide - specific off label approval

DARD's approval process follows that of the [Chemicals Regulations Directorate (CRD)](http://www.pesticides.gov.uk/guidance/industries/pesticides "Chemicals Regulations Directorate (CRD)"){:rel="external"} who issue approvals for Great Britain.

*[DARD]: Department of Agriculture and Rural Development
*[CRD]: Chemicals Regulations Directorate
